strings.Value: "There's a human child in your village. I came to trade for his release."
"I came to take the child, and I will take him — by force, if necessary."
[Offer 10 rations] "We come in peace. Please accept this food as a sign of our goodwill."
{n}Armed lizardfolk quickly advance on you.{/n} "Alert! Warmblood in village! Why come? What want?"
{n}The lizardfolk sniffs the food suspiciously, then tastes it.{/n} "If want peace, why no come gates? Why sneak like thief? Strange. Must talk Chieftain Vesket — he smart, he figure out. Come."
"Trade? Yes! Tasty food, sharp knives — good! Must talk Chieftain Vesket. Come."
"You want trade, come by gate! Why come like thief, like spy?"
{n}The lizardfolk recoils from you.{/n} "Wait, why need force? Want take child, must talk Chieftain Vesket! Come."
{n}Armed lizardfolk quickly advance on you.{/n} "Alert! Warmblood intruder! Fight, everyone!"
